imdb.plot outline: Master Sommelier Andrea and her husband John scour popular destinations like California's Napa Valley, Seattle, Paris, New York, Los Angeles and Las Vegas to ask recognized foodies what they recommend as insider favorites for visitors to their area and reveal little known "Local Flavor" travel secrets.
imdb.title: Local Flavor
plot: Master Sommelier Andrea and her husband John scour popular destinations like California's Napa Valley, Seattle, Paris, New York, Los Angeles and Las Vegas to ask recognized foodies what they recommend as insider favorites for visitors to their area and reveal little known "_Local Flavor_ (qv)" travel secrets.::Anonymous
